mapper.sql: id, status, createTime, updateTime, objId, userId, isGood, isBad, isCollection, collectionTime,objType
mapper.select: select u.*,r.title,r.avid,r.owner,r.ownerId,r.pic,r.remark,r.hot,r.cid,r.good,r.bad,r.collection from tab_objxuser u left join tab_video r on u.objId = r.id LEFT JOIN tab_user p on p.id = u.userId where u.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into tab_objxuser (id, status, createTime, updateTime, objId, userId, isGood, isBad, isCollection, collectionTime,objType) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now(), #{objid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isgood,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isbad,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iscollection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectiontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{objtype,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update tab_objxuser
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
objId = #{objid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isGood = #{isgood,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isBad = #{isbad,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isCollection = #{iscollection,jdbcType=INTEGER},
collectionTime = #{collectiontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
objType = #{objtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tab_objxuser set status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = now(), objId = #{objid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isGood = #{isgood,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isBad = #{isbad,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isCollection = #{iscollection,jdbcType=INTEGER}, collectionTime = #{collectiontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, objType = #{objtype,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
